attributes.action: allow free local bus travel for the under 16's or under 25 in full time education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government want parents to stop using cars to transport children to school, and more people to use public transport. Surely free bus travel for unders 16's and under 25's in full time education would encourage people to ditch there cars, which would help with congestion and pollution to the enviroment. Will also encourage more walking, promoting a more active lifestyle.
